channel.title: Paternity Leave on Wendy's Hacker Mom Space
channel.description: Recent content in Paternity Leave on Wendy's Hacker Mom Space

item.title: Will I be so bored at my maternity/paternity leave?
item.description: The anxiety Months before I even started my maternity leave, I felt very anxious about that “break time”: what would it be like? Would it be just me and the baby sitting at home, me slaving away, desperately waiting for anyone to come rescue us? I started asking people questions about what they do at this time. Friend A: Don’t worry, you’ll be SO BUSY with the baby, you won’t even worry about what to do.
